# Hospital (Building)
## Overview
**Hospital**

**Create** 45 Goods, 4 Influence, 43 Labor, 2 Magic (2,080 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bath (Room)|Bath]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 2 [[Infirmary (Room)|Infirmaries]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]], 1 [[Workstation (Room)|Workstation]]

A building designated as a place for healing the sick.
